entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:23 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 01:38 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with freezing rain this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
